"EDM rights" field title should be changed to "Rights"
Title in masthead overflows on smaller screens

comments.body:
Some ideas for fixing this issue:
1. Let the text wrap and get rid of the max height on the masthead
2. Make the font size smaller so that the overflow doesn't happen in the first place
3. Add text-overflow that will add ellipsis if the title is too long

dpul.title: Fix masthead title overflow on smaller screen widths

comments.body: This PR is practically done except for fixing the font-size of the category titles on larger screens. Right now, for some reason, they are 1.25rem when they should be 1.5rem.

drds-handbook.title: How to restore OJS from a backup

dspace-development.title: Scheduling the synchronization of DataSpace deployment environments (dev, staging, and production)

comments.body: There is currently *not* an agreed-upon schedule for synchronizing databases between the server environments, and after internal team discussion, it was clarified that supporting this would *not* be possible in any automated manner.
It should be noted that, in past attempts to use database exports in order to restore the state of a deployment with a fresh installation, that this was *not* achievable.

figgy.title: DAO Generation should handle if the digital object has already been created.

comments.body: @acozine I'd be careful here - a number of these jobs shell out to processes which properly utilize CPU, you might end up spiking the machine if a bunch of OCR runs at once, for instance.
@tpendragon good to know. I'll start by increasing the cores on lib-proc6, which is the VM that keeps choking. Once all three VMs have the same resources, I'll think about next steps.
